titles.title: Work for the Night is Coming

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
Work
while the dew is sparkling;
Work,
mid springing flow’rs.

verse.name: v1c
v1d
v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Fill brightest hours
with labor,
Rest comes sure and soon.

verse.name: v2c
v2d
v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
While their bright tints
are glowing,
Work,
for daylight flies.

verse.name: v3c
